author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD WELL NORTH OF JOHNSTON ATOLL...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD WELL NORTH OF JOHNSTON ATOLL...
 As of 5:00 AM HST Wed Aug 28
 the center of Hone was located near 20.5, -168.5
 with movement W at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
